transport.question: I go 'Choo Choo!' What am I?
I have wheels and go 'Vroom Vroom!' What am I?

hints.text: 🔑 You need a key to start me.

transport.question: I float on the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I can be big or small.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal me. What am I?

hints.text: 🛎️ I have a bell you can ring.
⛑️ You should wear a helmet when you ride me.
🤸 You use your feet to make me go.

transport.question: I take lots of people to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🚦 I stop to let children get on and off.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: 💺 People sit inside me to travel.

transport.question: I carry heavy things on the road. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I have a big space in the back.
🚚 I am bigger than a car.

transport.question: I have a siren and help people who are sick. What am I?

hints.text: 🏥 I take people to the hospital.
🚑 I have a red cross on the side.

transport.question: I zoom through space to visit the moon and stars. What am I?
I fly high in the sky, but I don't have wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I have a spinning blade on top.
⬆️ I can go straight up and down.
🏥 Some of me are used to rescue people.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, drip, drip, drop. You need an umbrella when I plop! What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You use an umbrella to stay dry from me.

weather.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the sky. I keep you warm, way up so high! What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses when I am out.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the air. Sometimes I bring rain, so beware! What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am made of water droplets.

weather.question: I am cold and white, and I fall from the sky. I'm fun to play with! What am I?

hints.text: ☃️ You can make a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when I am around.

weather.question: I blow through the trees and rustle the leaves. I can be gentle, or make you sneeze! What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make the leaves dance.
💨 You can fly a kite with me.

weather.question: After the rain, I appear in the sky. I have many colors! What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.

weather.question: I am ice that falls from the sky, sometimes in summer. Ouch! Watch out when I'm falling! What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am made of frozen water.
🤕 I can hurt if I hit you.
⚽ I can be the size of a ball.

weather.question: I light up the sky with a big flash of light, followed by a loud boom that can give you a fright! What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am part of a storm.

weather.question: I am loud and rumble in the sky after a flash. I follow lightning! What am I?

hints.text: 🌩️ I follow a flash of light.
👂 You hear me during a storm.

weather.question: I am a very big storm with strong, spinning winds. I can knock down trees and make loud sounds, so be safe indoors until I am done! What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 You need to stay inside when I come.
